revised_title: Master of the Ais: A Book Review on Sir Sydney Camm's Design Leadership
tldr: This book review discusses 'Master of the Ais: A Biography of Sir Sydney Camm, Aviation Pioneer' by John W. Fozard. The review highlights the life and work of Sir Sydney Camm, a prominent figure in the development of British aviation, from his early years to his leadership role in designing aircraft such as the Hurricane and the Harrier. The book is praised for its detailed account of Camm's life and contributions to aviation history.
